short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tonic Wallet - First multi-accounts based TON Wallet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The first multi-accounts based TON extension V4 wallet.

Featrues
- Jetton Support
- Mainnet / Testnet Support
- Multi-accounts Support

An TON Wallet in your Browser
Tonic Wallet is an extension for accessing TON network enabled distributed applications, or "Dapps" in your browser!

The extension injects the Tonic web3 API into every website's javascript context, so that dapps can read from the blockchain.

Tonic Wallet also lets the user create and manage their own identities (via private keys, local client wallet), so when a Dapp wants to perform a transaction and write to the blockchain, the user gets a secure interface to review the transaction, before approving or rejecting it.

Tonic Wallet also supports Jetton management, Testnet network, and multi-accounts features like Metamask experience. 

Disclaimer: This version is still a working product that needs to undergo testing and further updates. Also it is currently compatible with only Ton Wallet V4 version. Please be advised"
